Transcription for 547097

I praise the Lord, triumphant, Who from the grave is risen, His fire and death so glorious,
Down in His church they call His, That we might all agree.
Hallelujah, hallelujah, Praising God, evermore!
And give me, Father, a blessing, A blessing like thy body, Like God, O Lord, with unfriending,
And let my heart be your feed, Hallelujah, hallelujah, Praising God, evermore!
Hallelujah, hallelujah, Praising God, evermore!
Hallelujah, hallelujah, Praising God, evermore!
